so one  might wonder what it is about my roommate that throws me into a murderous rage.  

here is one example.

ysmay just spent 5 days at home for easter.  she spent the weekend before that in paris with her aunt.  the weekend before that she was in paris with her brother.  and the weekend before that her father was here.  and yet.  EVERY NIGHT she spends a good 2-3 hours on the phone with her family.  She got home last night from 5 days with her family, and then spoke to her mum on the phone for an hour and a half.   which would almost be okay if she had a decent voice, but she is SO LOUD and she screeches and sounds like a bad british drama.  Her dad emailed her today so she CALLED him to thank him for it and discuss what he wrote.  Norman Bates, anyone?

I am so glad that I am going away this weekend, and that everyone is disappearing over the holiday.  otherwise I am going to have to come up with reasons to be "temporarily insane" so I don't have to go to jail after I kiillllll heeerrrrrrrr

generally I really freaking freaking hate the sound of idina menzels voice (and it has almost nothing to do with the fact that she is married to taye diggs and I'm not) but she sounds really good in wicked.








but that has done nothing to abate the murderous rage I harbor inside me against the two fools I live with.
I think maybe tomorrow I'll buy some earplugs, then play my most annoying jpop song as loud as I can on repeat ALL DAY LONG in revenge.

I watched Transamerica and I don't get how it's a "comedy." it was more shakespearean tragedy in my opinion.

and felicity really ought to have won that oscar just for looking so ugly on screen, HA. though I totally believed that she was a man.

Things I learned this rainy weekend.

1.  I'm pretty bitchin' at doing my laundry in the bath tub.

I found someplace online where I can watch all 100 something episodes of sailormoon and I totally knew EVERY WORD to the opening song even though I haven't watched it since 7th grade when I got all those sailormoon toys for my birthday.. man those things are worth a lot of money now, too bad I played with them to death, LOL.  I'M COOL.



Fighting evil by moonlight, winning love by daylight....

You know I have been following this story in the news for a while, and I think all the critics at harvard need to shove their heads up their asses and shut up.

If you don't know what I'm talking about, one of the gyms at Harvard recently introduced "womens only" hours after 6 Muslim women asked if it would be possible for hours to be set aside where they could exercize without men around so that they could dress comfortably.

An official spokesman at harvard said that "this is america and they need to assimilate."

I don't see what the big idea is.  Plenty of gyms exist that have womens only hours, rooms, or crap gyms themselves.  I think what the big huff is about is the fact that it was 6 Muslim women who requested it.  If it had been a bunch of Harvard cheerleaders saying they wanted hours because they were sick of guys staring at their tits as they ran there would be no problem with it, but since it is Muslims who requested it, this whole thing has turned into a giant media service.

I bet you that those hours are going to become incredibly popular at the gym, and these critics are going to have to take it all back.

I don't know why it makes me so mad, maybe because it's so blatantly racist.  or maybe I'm just so bored I have nothing to bitch about, but still.

omg I didn't think I could hate anyone as much as I hate her.  the second she enters I just want to wring her throat.

5 weeks till vacation.

I would like to officially welcome to the family Lulu Favorito, our brand new 18 week old Yorkie puppy.  I only have pictures from Nick's iphone at the moment, but as soon as I have better pictures I will post them.



we got a puppy wheeeeeeeeeeeeee!!!!!!!
I got into BU school of ed. today!! yaaaay for having a future!

on day two of my vacation I fell and sprained my ankle, and 10 odd days later it is still swollen/hurting but I can't afford a trip to the doctor so I am spending the weekend in bed watching seasons one and two of west wing--oh charlie!

in other news, I think I have bed sores.
so I'm watching degrassi 101, aka another every episode ever marathon, and I can't stop laughing because manny has a mustache. HA

So I'm posting this from my crazy new mac--Nancy, I went with the white one too.  THe matte black just seemed like it would scratch so easy.  It's been weird using it--I sometimes used Robs, but this one is smaller and just weeeiiiiiird.  Plus the edge is kind of sharp and is digging into my skin. WTF APPLE????

Today I spent all day cleaning.  I am officially unpacked from college! woohoo!!  The room is 98% done.  Just stuff to clean up, the rug to put down, and then it's just books and stuff that have been lazing around downstairs, nothing too horribly exciting.  I am excited to get used to this computer, though I am having to use help more than I really want to, lol.  I will forgive myself.

It's getting so laaaaaate.  It's almost the 20th!!  I leave in a little over a month. EEK.  I'm taking the GRE on sept 4, then I'm going to head out to Union to see Abbey and the girls at AlbanyMed.  I'll drop off a few recommendation forms, since I'm hoping that when I get back in December all I have to do is assemble my applications and mail them out.  Michelle will be in France with me, so I can just have her send them to me there.  Then Charles, and I don't know who I'll choose as a third.  I wonder if Veronique can do it...it's my teaching experience, after all.  We'll see.

I'm only applying to two grad schools this year--BC and BU.  BC is my #1.  They're the only two schools in the state that I found that offer the kind of program and degree that I want--an MAT in Secondary Ed with a concentration in French.  If, heaven forbid, I don't make it in, I'll work for a year and then start applying out of state.

ANywho I have to shower, I havent done that in a day or two and tomorrow is the family picnic.  Ciao

so last night I relived fifth grade, it was beautiful.  I sat in the living room and ate macaroni and cheese (kraft style) and watched the greatest movie ever made.  Yes, I am talking about Street Fighter the Movie. HAHAHAHAHAHHA.  I used to be obsessed with that movie.  Now all I need to do is go to all star band and then get made fun of/beaten up and my fifth grade revival will be complete. wo0t!

yesterday I also got my new lovies, Harriet and Tubby.  aka my new 30 gig ipod and macbook.  a what what??  exactly.  all in preparation for la france.  I also finished painting the room (finally) and am about halfway done with the final cleaning process. Tomorrow my phone contract is up and I am buying the phone of my dreams, because it's on saaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaale.  I will have it for a month, then be parted for 8, hahahaha.  I don't care because it will be beautiful.

I am slowly getting excited about France, just because I've been talking to so many people in my academie.  I met a fellow french major/japanese minor!!  He doesn't know it yet, but we're getting married and adopting asian babies.  I thought I'd wait a bit to break the news to him.

my knee feels very liquidy today, which suuuuucks.  um.  I don't know.  I feel as if there should be so much more to say but I really can't think of anything (have not had my coffe yet).  I tried to kick the coffee thing but it really didn't work very well.  my body is too used to it.  All I did was sleep sleep sleep and crave coffee.  damn the man

wow, so it's almost over.  i'm sitting here in the library (something i almost never do) trying to finish a take home final thats due tomorrow at three.  but i'm really not in a working mood right now, but i still have about a page left in one paper, and then another 3-5 page paper to write before this take home is done.  thank god the library is open 24 hours now, though i'll probably have to stop for a nap at some point.

i'm at the library because i'm here with friends.  i've never enjoyed the library, but it's different when you have friends you can be miserable with.  we actually just got back from a pancake study break at wold house, where i totally scored a wold house tee-shirt.  i think at this point i have...9 free union college tee shirts, ha!  1 wold, 2 green house, 2 accepting the best, 1 springfest, 1 ambassadors, 2 tye-dye.  wo0t for free clothes!

it's kind of surreal right now.  i'm working out my summer (since I will not be returning to the bandn) and trying not to stress about the big move, but all in all it comes down to the fact that soon i will no longer be at union college.

it's scary

wow long time no see, eh?  though honestly the only reason I'm posting is because I love typing on this keyboard.  I have a thing about keyboards.  I like the feel and shape of them and the clicky sounds they make when you type.  My laptop keyboard doesn't make good clicky sounds, but this mac keyboard does... I CAN"T BELIEVE I SAID THAT.  I guess its kind of the way I like wearing heels and shoes that make the clicky sounds because I always associated that sound with being old and mature and sophisticated.  I blame it on elementary school.

I totally didn't study for my japanese midterm, oops?  Not to mention the fact that I have thesis pages due tomorrow and I don't know yet what exactly I'll be writing about in this chunk because, well... I don't have research done for it, HAH.  Then friday I have a quiz, and hopefully after that i'll be HOME because I need to get away from here for a bit, not that I don't love it but I'm so STRESSED.

Right anyways, I'ma go fail my midterm now then crawl back into bed for a while, because nothing says comfort like curling up in the fetal position and pulling the covers over your head.  KISSES

Obama has formed a presidential committee!! How exciting is that? Incredibly, obviously, or I would not have ended my something like month long livejournal silence to say anything.

In other words no one showed up to bookclub today, boooo after yesterday being such a success!!!  All right off to do shit now

well happy holidays to all.  would say more and talk about the past few weeks like I've been meaning to, but its just my luck that I get sick at christmas.  have not kept food in my system since 9 am yesterday.  missed probably some of the best eats of the year, gr. am mad because I have to much to do to be sick, and who likes to be sick anyways?

So yesterday at work was fun, even though they made me work in music, ew!  Amy, the manager, was in a totally bitchy mood but whateverrr today I'm working from 7-10.  totally freaking bizarre, my wages won't even pay for the gas probably.  

I've been super productive today.  I mailed out my TA application and emailed professors about various things.  I called the mailroom at school and found out that my package got forwarded yesterday, yay!  I spoke to Rebecca for a while and did some more tattoo research.  I think we're going to go to Chameleon in Harvard Square.  It's been around for a while, it looks super neat, Sine had no problems there when she got her belly button pierced, and I dated the owners nephew in 10th grade, HAHA.  Also, more importantly, their website was way more helpful than the place in NH, as was the girl I spoke to on the phone.  So I think we're ringing in the new years with some purty tats!

Next on my list is to figure out wtf is wrong with my computer.  I should probably clean out the fan and see how it goes from there, then bring it up to the guys down the street and have them take a look at it.  I need to eat and shower and keep on cleaning.  Tomorrow I work with boyfriend for 3.5 hours, yay!!  I worked with super awesome Shannon last night, and finally saw Michelle.  I missed my work friends major, believe it or not.

I need to figure out what to have for lunch/dinner so I'm outtie.

I would just like to say that, as an insomniac, I love having a side by side fridge/freezer because when I need that little something extra to help me sleep I can open the freezer, guzzle a mouthful of cheap vodka and before I've finished swallowing open the fridge and have the gatorade ready to follow.










I swear I'm not an alcoholic, really.  Mommy said it was okay to do it, I swears

oh wow its me again what do you know?

I slept well except for the weird dream about bugs (I think thanks to that king of the hill episode. shudder.) and it was super hot for some reason and I had to get up and pee twice, which isn't as much fun when the bathroom is on another floor.

I think I'mm start my christmas list today, which will basically consist of things to make my computer run faster/better.  Though no, no, actually I'm not.  I'ma download mcafees (since nortons screwed me over) and delete the twelve thousand mp3s I have on my computer.  Especially since if I go away next year I plan on buying a new one anyways, so theres no point in buying all this stuff I won't need.  

Though I never watch the show I really want the desperate housewives game.  it looks like fuuun.  Though really this break I should be like, you know, working on thesis or whatever.  Really I'm just going to spend the whole time playing games. wo0t.  and not shopping, because I'm po.

speaking of not shopping along with that there will be no eating.  i'm super gross.  liz was supposed to lose 10 pounds..and she gained 6.  WTF.  My body hates me, I swears it.  Hopefully the gym remembered to fudgy my membership so I can spent the entire month of december at the gym.  because I am disgusted by myself ew ew ew.

I'm so booooored.  I would play games in the living room but daddy is sleeping, though I suppose I could wake him up and make him go upstairs.  But wheres mommy?  More importantly, wheres mommy with the coffee? ? ? ? ? 

Rebeccaaaaa why aren't you home to entertain meeeeeeeeee

Wow home for like 20 minutes and grumpy already.  The hallway actually looks really nice--now if only it matched the style of the rest of the house.  The new tv is awesome except for dads shit that is going to collapse on it sometime soon.


The drive home was uneventful.  Lots of singing and swerving and almost peeing my pants.  I'm happy to be home and I can't wait to work and sleep in my bed, but damn I miss the tidy-ness of the appartment already.  I know what I'm doing until I start working again (aka becoming super maid Liz).

My dad is going to the hospital tonight to have sleep tests done.  I think he has sleep apnia (or however you spell it) where you like, randomly stop breathing for a second in your sleep.  He's supposed to have surgery to repair one of his nostrils but he is being super stubborn.  My brother had surgery on his nose for the same reason, I think, (like only 10% usage), I remember that was the first time I ever have McDonalds!  And I made my mom peel the skin off the chicken nuggets.  Oh, classic.

NO SCHOOL WOOOO.  Who is going to the football game thurs?  When does the damn thing even start?







ps call me you know you want to.

well then I don't think I can recall the last time I posted on livejournal.  But since sleep seems to be a long time coming I thought I'd pop by and say hello.

Life has been good lately.  I'm in the poorhouse, but I scraping by.  My grades have improved majorly in french but I'm still not satisfied with my japanese.  I need to ace  my final or I might be in a bit of trouble (and by trouble I mean a B+).  My spanish class turned out to be a lot of fun but I still hate the language and am definately not continuing it.  oops?

I rearranged my room and now its super fun and cute and I finally decorated my walls the other day.  I finished Nicky's birthday present over the weekend and mailed it to him today.  I never get any mail and that makes me saaaaaad.  Though I will be getting my new manga soon, and the cd I won on eBay.  I hate how hard it is to find anime mp3s, especially when I'm obsessed with out of date series.  I'm the cool kid, yeah.

I fuckin hate acid reflux.  I thought maybe I had an ulcer but now I'm thinking maybe a tumor.  I'm never hungry, and you guys know that is bizarre.  I'm a little hungry in the morning, and then the rest of the day I feel full, and when i force myself to eat (because I should not go 12 hours and still not be hungry) I get that word I can never spell (nauseated? but not in the past tense) and then I get acid reflux. AH.

My friends are super awesome, though, and nowadays I very rarely eat by myself.  I like having friends.

this whole week has been very stressful and overwhelming and I can't wait to just get sleep.  I can't remember the last time I really had a good nights sleep and didn' wake up a million times and wonder if I got everything done and did everything right and made the right choices.

so tonight was "halloween" at union college.  I spent over 2 weeks making my costume (I was Athena!)  and it actually ended up coming out great.  I didn't take any pictures but everyone else did so I should have some to post eventually.  I didn't even use a patteren, it is all my design and creation!!

so obviously I am still shitfaced but I am feeling a lot better.  I was nervous about my costume because I thought it was shitty and lame, but once I did my hair and make up and such it looked fantastic.  Fun times drinking, though I bought myself some Captain Morgans and only got like, two sips of it.  Fucking whores owe me rum.  We went to music and culture house which was fun for a while.  But my roomie from last year, Shai, was really sick.  and when I say really sick I mean she didn't know where she was and couldn't keep her eyes open.  I insisted we call campus safety m but the two girls with her didn't want to and told me to leave her alone.  Fucking girl couldn't stand on her own, or keep her eyes open.  They tried to walk her home but couldn't, and eventually got into a car to go back to her dorm.  I told the driver not to leave and I called campus safety, to take her to the hospital.  The car drove off, so I called campus safety back and told them they were going back to her dorm and told them what she looked like and who she was with.  thankfully the driver, jess, was asertive and just dropped them all off at the hospital.  I don't care i fthey get mad that i called campus safety, shais health is more important to me than anything else.

so then music and culture became lame and we went to the iota party, which was also lame.  I walked around campus with my dress around my waist to keep my arms warm (I was wearing leggings).  On the walk back I ran into Tony and so he was a gentleman and offered me his arm and walked me home.  Huzzah!  So here i am, home, safe and sound and a little too drunk for bed, though I made sure to clean my bed off before I left (thats why I'm an honors student!0  I'm fucking exhausted but I'm not in the right state for sleep (not that I puke or get hung over, I just don't like going to bed like this) so I think I will stay up for alittle longer and stop writing livejournal entries that probably don't make sense to anyone ut me and are full of spelling errors.  so good night and god bless

I've been back at school for a week now and I have to say its turning out very well.

My apartment is so incredibly awesome it isn't even kidding.  It's on the second floor.  When you enter you walk into the living room, which has a wall of windows and enough room for a love seat, two chairs, a coffee table, 3 end tables, and then some.  Immediately to your left from the front door (if you do like, a 280) is my room, which is enormous.  It also has a wall of windows, and a closet big enough to fit the like, 24 pairs of shoes I brought with me.. I didn't know I had that many!!!!  My room is super cute.  I have a moon nightlight that I put on at night if I'm not going to be back before it gets dark.  I had bought super cute curtains from Ikea for my windows, they have 3d roses and bumble bees on them, but the windows come with curtains, so I hung them to frame the head of my bed.  I will post pictures soon!  My bed was kind of shitty but I went to loews and bought particle board and made it better.

When you leave the living room you go through this hall that is legit 1.5 feet long.  We strung a set of tube lighting in it for night time.  The kitchen is also huge.  We have a full fridge and a stove and oven and a 4 person table.  I wish though we had more counter space and cabinet space, though our apartment did come with a microwave. 

The apartment is shaped like a U, so you turn the corner and go into the back hallway.  Theres a bookcase back there with all my coffee stuff, cookbooks, and some of robs stuff.  His room is at the end of the hall, and as far away from my room as you can get, and less than half the size of my room..oops? HEE.  We got a cute curtain for our bathroom--frogs!

My classes are ok.  I HATE my spanish class, only because the professor sucks.  Its spanish 1, which you take if you've never had spanish or if you've had 1 year in high school.. but she seems to teach it towards the kids who have already taken it.  She assigns us all this work to do, and expects to read the text, understand it, and have it all memorized for the next class.  Japanese was way easier to learn, and the fact that I can say that is WAY HORRIBLE.

All my other classes (aka 2) are good.  Japanese will be a struggle, but I think I'm going to use my pass/fail for spanish.

My social life is going incredibly well, haha.  Friday night I worked the "door" at the Sorum tailgate party and chatted with Kelly B.  Then I bumped into Heidy, Shai, Arisa, Judy, Gnana, Amanda... I think thats it.  We went to a party on seward and got there as it was busted.  We at one point were followed by these two guys who yelled something at us and one of them winked at me, but we found out it was just Tony from Japanese and Pat, the kid who lives downstairs.  I'm so happy Lanzasan is back at union!!  So we went to Pats apartement (aka downstairs) and hung out there for a while, then went 1 am bbq at blue.

Saturday..hahaha. oh Saturday.  I never showered, which stank because some que j'aime beaucoup est venu.  We chilled for a while and he mentioned he was at the party downstairs, so I threw on clothes and went down (I had mentioned to pat the night before I was going to invite myself, lol.)  Josie from the ship was there, so we chatted for a bit.  Then Sandy called and confirmed the plans for the night.

Sat was ChiChi's birthday so we decided to go to Waterworks, one of the gay clubs in albany.  No, I have nothing important I need to tell you, lol.  I had already been drinking, but we had 2 DDs so we piled into my car and went...and Max is never driving my car again.  Anyways, Waterworks was fun until half our group got kicked out, lol.  Max, one of the DDs, for accepting a drink from a waiter and drinking it (JERK) and Chichi and John for giving alcohol to a minor..haha.  So we piled into the cars and went to Denny's, where I had a yummy french toast breakfast at 3 in the morning.  Made it home by 4,  asleep by 401, lol.

Yesterday I just did work, then Robs friends came over for chinese food.  It was fun, I <3 his friend Ariel.  

Today was classes and unfortunately a lot of pain.  I have a lot of stupid health problems right now and am still getting used to the medications.  Almost threw up at one point, but I made yummy banana bread and one does not waste the bb, so all was held in.

I've been doing work and decided to take a break, so there was my update.  In the week I have been at school I have gone to the dining hall once.  I like being self sufficient, and i really need to learn to cook not only for me but for my fam too so that I can take up some of the dinner responsibilities when I am home.

Thats it for nowww

so I'm at school in our fantastically huge apartment...but my internet is not working.  why does this always happen to me?  my internet never wants to work,, and now rob has gone off on a booty call and I'm all by myself and I don't want to continue unpacking.  I think I am just going to read trashy magazines and go to sleep, and pray to god that the people downstairs (or maybe upstairs?) aren't always this loud.
RIP Steve Irwin, Crocodile Hunter.  I loved you so.

going back to school soon, huzzah!  went malling last night with the sis, going today with michelle from work.  speaking of work, my doctor says that it gave me a pooping problem.  as in, the stress from work has made my colon go crazy and they want me to cut out dairy and caffeine.

HA. RIGHT.

woohoo!!  Hingham called me last night to let me know they have hours for me!!  So I am currently on loan to the Hingham Barnes and Noble for very odd hours...aka I'm covering everyone elses vacations...but at least that means I might get to go on spring break after all!!!

Leaving to go to NH for the weekend.  We'll see how it goes, since it's a 2 hour ride in the car with my grandmother... I'm calling dibs on shotgun, though, since the back seat makes me ill.  HAHA SUCKER.

So if I send you an angry text message, you will know why, lol

so I'm back from one of the most incredible experiences of my lifetime and while I would love to gush about it, I can't.

I'm too depressed.

The minute I left the ship I have just been hit with bad news after bad news.  I got my first B ever in my college career.  I HAVE NO JOB.  Barnes and Noble can't afford to take me back.  I talked to a manager at Hingham who swore they were hiring but when I went today I was told they aren't.  I need to go to bandn and talk to them and figure out what is going on but I'm really dreading it, since every time I think about it I burst into tears.

So pretty much there goes my plans for the year.  No research in France.  No spring break.  No pretty decor for my apartment.  Sorry boo.

In other news, who wants to go to a Better than Ezra/Sister Hazel concert in August with me? $16.

STRESSED




but in other news, I'll be home tomorrow!!!!  for a few days at least.....

I FOUND THE PRECIOUS!!!!!!!!


aka the aida and les miz soundtracks I 'lost' ages ago. wo0t for packing!

I HAVE THE COOLEST RINGTONE EVER.


It wasn't exactly the ringtone I wanted, but it's still Juanes.

HOT HOT HOT

I haven't even seen it yet, but I'm really sad about X3.  I may have to refuse to see it, so I can keep myself in my happy little X-bubble.


Did she at least redeem herself?

I'm....annoyed.  I have a week and a half of classes left and I just want to get out of here.  I've been excited because my grades are going so well, and then I got a french paper back today and had an 85.  Thats the lowest grade I've ever gotten on a french paper in my college career.  So obviously I am going to re-write it, especially since we're required to re-write at least one paper.  But I'm annoyed because we passed these papers in the 8th and just got them back now.  I know thats 2 weeks, but when your trimester is only 10 weeks long, 2 weeks is a lot of time.  And next week is the last week of classes, and I don't know how I"m supposed to squeeze in this damn revision in the middle of all the rest of the work I need to get done.

Most professors I have take a week at most to get papers back.  What the fuck takes her so long to do it?

So now I'm cranky, though slightly excited because I'm actually hungry, and with all the stressing I've done (to the point where I made myself physically ill) I haven't had an appetite in ages.

and to make it even worse... I had a craving to watch Mulan II last night and so I open up the dvd case and found... MOULIN ROUGE.  SAY IT OUT LOUD AND SEE WHAT MADE ME EVEN MORE MADDD.

send me love.  or come visit me.  YOU KNOW YOU WANT TO (jess falbo)
